ItemType.name: Abbasid thanogram
ItemType.description: This is a neural network initialized from the cerebral patterns of one or more Scholars of Abbasid. The legal, ethical, and moral knowledge of the Abbasid is contained and interpreted by these constructs.

StationType.name: (Xenophobe worldship)

Default.desc: You are docked at the lifeless ruins of a destroyed station. A group of refugees, huddling in the cavernous bay, tell you that the station was destroyed by Xenophobes.

Events.OnCreate:
(block (asteroidCount maxMiners) ; Count the number of asteroids in the area (within 60 light-seconds) (setq asteroidCount (count (sysFindObject gSource "t:asteroid; N:60;")))
; Compute the number of miners (setq maxMiners (multiply asteroidCount 2)) (if (gr asteroidCount 0) (setq maxMiners (add maxMiners (random 1 asteroidCount))) )
; Sometimes we get more miners (if (leq (random 1 100) 5) (setq maxMiners (multiply maxMiners 2)) )
(objSetData gSource "maxMiners" maxMiners)
; Register timer event for construction (sysAddObjRecurringTimerEvent (random 400 800) gSource "OnConstruction") )

ItemType.name: Gaian demolition cannon
ItemType.description: These immense cannons are used by the Gaian Terraformers for their vast engineering projects. The technology to power the cannon is known only to the Gaians.

ItemType.name: Heliotrope fuel cylinder
ItemType.description: Heliotrope starship fuel is known to be one of the cleanest and most powerful fuels available. Too bad that the Heliotrope don't part with it willingly.

Events.OnRefuel:
; Chance that this will enhance the ship's drive (if (leq (random 1 100) (multiply 2 (itmGetCount gItem))) (objEnumItems gSource "rI" theItem (switch (itmIsDamaged theItem) (block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat "Your " (itmGetName theItem 0) " has been repaired.")) (shpRepairItem gSource theItem) )
(not (itmIsEnhanced theItem)) (block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat "Your " (itmGetName theItem 0) " has been enhanced.")) (shpEnhanceItem gSource theItem) ) ) ) )

ItemType.name: sunflare cannon
ItemType.description: Heliotropes use a heavy ion particle cannon known as a sunflare cannon. The blast from a sunflare cannon is almost as destructive as a solar eruption.

ItemType.name: Penitent cannon
ItemType.description: Very little is known about these exotic, dark-matter weapons. The Order of Penitence uses these weapons in their ships.

Main.name: Abandoned Cargo Container
Main.Panes:
(block (contents roll) (objSetData gSource "Opened" True)
; Pick contents randomly (setq roll (random 1 100)) (switch (ls roll 15) (setq contents 1) ; 15% empty (ls roll 45) (setq contents 2) ; 30% random items (ls roll 55) (setq contents 3) ; 10% acid (ls roll 75) (setq contents 4) ; 20% refugees (setq contents 5) ; 25% pirate attack )
; Set the pane and contents (scrShowPane gScreen (cat "Contents" contents)) (objSetData gSource "Contents" contents) )
(switch (eq (objGetData gSource "Contents") 4) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. There is a family of refugees living here.") (block (allItems itemCount) (setq allItems (objGetItems gSource "*")) (setq itemCount (count allItems)) (switch (eq itemCount 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. There are no items here.") (eq itemCount 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. You see " (itmGetName (item allItems 0) 8) " here.")) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. You see several items here.")) ) ) )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsLoot;") )
; Cargo container is empty
; Cargo container has some random junk
(block (allItems itemCount) (objAddRandomItems gSource &trCargoContainer; 1)
(setq allItems (objGetItems gSource "*")) (setq itemCount (count allItems)) (switch (eq itemCount 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen "The cargo container is empty.") (eq itemCount 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The cargo container has " (itmGetName (item allItems 0) 8) ".")) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The cargo container is filled with various items.")) ) )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsLoot;") )
; Cargo container is filled with a powerful acid
(block (allItems desc) (setq desc "The cargo container was filled with a powerful industrial solvent which has flooded your ship's cargo hold.")
; pick a random item in the ship's cargo hold to damage (setq allItems (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U -ID;"))
; Destroy an item (if (eq (count allItems) 0) (setq desc (cat desc " Fortunately, your cargo hold is empty and nothing was damaged.")) (block (itemDamaged) (setq itemDamaged (random allItems)) (setq desc (cat desc " The solvent has destroyed " (itmGetName itemDamaged 8) ".")) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip itemDamaged) ) )
; set the desc (scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
; Cargo container is occupied by some refugees
; Cargo container is a trap for some pirates
(block Nil (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist 0 gPlayerShip &etPirateAmbush1; 50) (scrExitDock gScreen) )
